body.p:
JOHN L. SCOTT. D. G. VENABLE.
SCOTT & VENABLE,
Military Claim Agents,
FRANKFORT, KY.
☞Will attend to the preparation and collection of all manner of Military Claims against the United States and State of Kentucky, including Officers' and Soldiers' back pay and bounty.
☞Also Bounties, Back Pay, and Pensions due to Fathers, Mothers, and Heirs.
☞Also claims for all manner of provisions furnished to Federal Soldiers; and claims for Horses and other property destroyed, pressed, or seized by any Officers or Soldiers of the Federal Army.
☞We have all kinds of Military Blanks on hand, and are prepared to give prompt attention to all claims entrusted to us before the proper Departments in Washington City and Frankfort.

James Graves was fined in the Franklin Circuit Court the sum of Two Hundred Dollars for an assault committed some two years or more ago. He soon after left his wife and two small children in very destitute circumstances and has not since returned to support them. His wife has appealed to me to forgive her husband so far as in my power, so that he might return home. Under all the circumstance I believe the case presents facts calling for the exercise of Executive clemency, and therefore I recommend that the fine be remitted

Very Respectfully
R E Collins D S
H I Todd
F. D. Reddish
H J Meets
James Harlan Jr
P. Swigert
John L. Scott.
